english.segment1: In the morning, when I rise. In the morning, when I rise. In the morning, when I rise, give me Jesus
english.segment2: Give me Jesus, Give me Jesus, You can have all this world, But give me Jesus
english.segment3: When I am alone. When I am alone. When I am alone, give me Jesus
english.segment4: Give me Jesus, Give me Jesus, You can have all this world, But give me Jesus
english.segment5: When I come to die. When I come to die. When I come to die, give me Jesus
english.segment6: Give me Jesus, Give me Jesus, You can have all this world, You can have all this world, You can have all this world, But give me Jesus
